price: Kò sì sí ẹni tó ń pè é ní irọ́ àyàfi gbogbo alákọyọ, ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
